solution_line_template: Daisy originally had {monday_toys} dog toys on Monday + {tuesday_new_toys} more her owner bought her on Tuesday = <<{monday_toys}+{tuesday_new_toys}={old_and_tuesday_toys}>>{old_and_tuesday_toys} dog toys.

On Wednesday Daisy's owner bought her {wednesday_new_toys} more dog toys + {old_and_tuesday_toys} old ones = <<{wednesday_new_toys}+{old_and_tuesday_toys}={total_toys}>>{total_toys} total dog toys if none were lost.
